captions.text:
I am angry, I am. 
You're fired

Get out of my 
face forever
Go away

Will you make you happy 
if I call your name three times?

Joo Jung Won,
Joo Jung Two

Joo Jung three.
Joo Jung three.

When you brush 
by my hand

The cold heart 
becomes warm

I want to get closer 
to you and rest

But the distance between
us  doesn't go away

It’s okay even if 
I can’t touch you

It’s okay even if 
I can’t hold you

Lonely love 
Yes I love you

I can feel you 
like my destiny
My heart can get to you

I want to hold out 
my hands and hold you

But I can’t because 
you might go away

I just linger around
you

It’s okay even if 
I can’t love you

It’s okay even if 
I can’t reach you

Lonely love 
Yes I love you

I can see you even from
Far away

It’s okay even if 
I can’t touch you

It’s okay even if 
I can’t hold you

Lonely love
Yes I love you

I can feel you 
like my destiny
My heart can get to you
Lonely love

Touch Love 
t, Yoonmirae

title: [MV] t Yoonmirae(t 윤미래) _ Touch love (터치 러브) (Master`s sun(주군의 태양) OST Part 4)

comments.text:
best OST ever, and i think this makes the drama excellent, it appears at a 
very right timing and the first few notes can already make my heart pound. 
the drama makes this song popular, and the song makes the drama successful. 
Yoonmirae is really a good singer, there will not be breathing sound which 
is good, and she is so omnipotent. Just GREAT!﻿
